title: Stefan-Boltzmann Law
description: Use basic python to apply the SB law to stars.

title: Exoplanet Properties
description: Explore the properties of exoplanets and detection techniques.

title: Astronomical Imaging
description: Learn how to read in and visualize the contents of a fits file.

title: HII Regions in M33
description: Investigate HII regions in an image of M33; determine their sizes and number of OB stars.

title: Trigonometric Regression
description: Fit Cepheid star pulsations using trigonometric regression models.

title: Stellar Temperatures from Spectra
description: Apply stellar models to infer temperature.

title: Gaia Star Clusters
description: Retrieve Gaia data to visualize and identify star clusters.

title: Rogue Planet Habitability
description: Create a hypothetical galaxy and check whether a rogue planet could remain habitable via flux from nearby supernovae.

title: Introduction to Data Parallelization
description: Use simple parallelization in Python to decrease runtimes.
